title: I Will Make Sure He Stays Here Forever (Part 2)
body:
I Will Make Sure He Stays Here Forever (Part 2)

Deep inside the Dark Forest, in a dark area, two deep green eyes suddenly opened and looked in a certain direction.

"Some people just triggered the formation," A man said in a cold voice and strange black and white runes started to flash in his green eyes.

The surrounding world essence shuddered and immense pressure filled the area. Strange runes continued to gleam in the man's green eyes as if he was trying to see the mysteries of the world.

Around one minute later, the eyes of the man returned to normal and a look of confusion flashed inside them.

"I don't feel any danger, but at the same time I can't find anything about the people who triggered the formation," The man muttered in a strange voice and continued to look in the direction where the formation was triggered.

"Ashley," After a moment, the man called out in a low voice.
